response:
{"message": "Dear Bob,

I am delighted to present our flagship product, which I believe could significantly enhance your business operations and elevate your market position. Given its exceptional capabilities and the impact it can have on your company, I am extending an exclusive offer to you. For a limited time, you have the opportunity to acquire this product at a special introductory price of $950,000.

This offer represents a significant saving compared to the standard retail price of $1,200,000, making it a compelling proposition for you. I understand the value of strategic investments in your business growth, and this product is designed to support just that.

Please let me know if you would like to discuss this further or if you have any questions about how this product can be tailored to meet your specific needs. I am confident that it will prove to be a valuable asset for your organization.

Looking forward to your positive response,
Alice", "product_price": 950000}
